input.sentences: we went to see where grandma grew up .
she nearly cried when she saw this sign . this house is where she grew up .
it was a beautiful grand house | grandma said .
this home is where her grandparents lived . she said she misses them so much .
she could n't believe that there was a sign on this house too . grandma said she wished she did come here . she liked the memories in here head better .
output.sentences: I grew up at my grandma's house.
One day she placed a "No Trespassing" sign on the roof of the house because she grew marijuana.
The house my grandma had was huge and grand.
She now lives in a nursing home and misses the house she lived in because she called it home for so long.
She wished I had kept the sign so she could hold on to the memories of her pot farm.
